festival.introText: BELSONIC returns across 3 separate days with some of the biggest acts going.

faqs.question: When is Belsonic Festival 2023?
faqs.answer:
Belsonic Festival 2023 takes place on three different dates:

  • Saturday 17th June 2023
  • Friday 23rd June 2023
  • Wednesday 28th June 2023

faqs.question: How do I get to Belsonic Festival
Where is Belsonic Festival?
faqs.answer: Belsonic Festival is located at Ormeau Park, Ormeau Embankment, Belfast, BT7 3GG

faqs.question: Does Belsonic have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer:
PAOLO NUTINI, SAM FENDER & FLORENCE AND THE MACHINE at Belsonic 2023 are over 16s events, however under 16s can attend provided they are signed in with the Welfare Officers at the gates on the night and are accompanied at all times by a parent or guardian over the age of 25. A parent or guardian can only sign in a MAX of 2 under 16’s (minimum age limit of 5 years of age and must have show ticket).

 

Sign in is at the gates on the show day from 6pm.

 

Strictly 16+ ID Required events info

Over 16's only policy will be strictly enforced - persons who purchase and ignore conditions will be refused entry with NO refund. If you are asked to provide ID when entering the concert to prove your age, you will need to provide one of the following:

(Please note that  / Out of date / Photocopies / photos of ID's are  NOT accepted)

 

• Official valid Passport 

• Photo driving license

• Government approved Proof of age card PASS, Citizen card or www.validateuk.co.uk

• Electoral Card

• Student cards

• Yoti app will be accepted for proof of age at Belsonic events - https://www.citizencard.com/yoti-citizencard-new-id-solution-for-the-uk
